title: Pentridge: some ghosts and memories from the big house
creator_credit: Catherine Birmingham, Daniel Scharf and Daniel Scharf Productions
brief_description: An evocative record of Pentridge prison, one of Australia’s most infamous penal establishments. The notorious criminal Mark ‘Chopper’ Read joins author Ray Mooney and former guards, governors and fellow inmates to relate stories of the harsh conditions and camaraderie shared by prisoners until the prison’s closure in the early nineties.
